org.alienideology.jcord.oauth

Class OAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alienideology.jcord.oauth.OAuth

  • public class OAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    OAuth - Used to build applications that utilize authentication and data from the Discord API.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuth authorize(java.lang.String authorizeCode)
      Authorize the application with an authorization code.
      OAuth authorizeAt(int port)
      This set up a server from the redirectUrl and bind to the sepcified port.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        public OAuth authorize(java.lang.String authorizeCode)
        Authorize the application with an authorization code.
        Parameters:
        authorizeCode - The authorization code received from the redirectUrl server.
        Returns:
        OAuth for chaining.
        Throws:
        ErrorResponseException - For any error responses when authorising.

      • authorizeAt

        public OAuth authorizeAt(int port)
        This set up a server from the redirectUrl and bind to the sepcified port. Then the server will wait for user's authorization. If the user authorized the application, the server will get a redirected url with the authorization code as a query param.
        Parameters:
        port - The port.
        Returns:
        OAuth for chaining.

      • autoAuthorize

        public OAuth autoAuthorize()
        Automatically authorize the application and get the access token. This calls authorizeAt(int) with port 8080.
        Returns:
        OAuth for chaining.

      • refreshToken

        public OAuth refreshToken()
        Refresh the access token. This revokes the access token by posting a http request with the refresh token. If the access token is still functional, then this will not perform any action.
        Returns:
        OAuth for chaining.
